# recentlyUsed

**Type Property**

Font collection automatically maintained by NSFontManager.

## Declaration

```swift
static let recentlyUsed: NSFontCollection.Name
```

## Type Properties

- **allFonts**: All fonts in the system.
- **user**: Per-user unmodifiable collection.
- **favorites**: Font collection of the user’s preferred font descriptors.

items.description: Font collection of the user’s preferred font descriptors.
items.name: favorites
